mapper.update: UPDATE userFootprint SET footprintTime = #{footprintTime} WHERE footprintId = #{footprintId}
mapper.select: select footprintId from userFootprint where productId=#{productId}

SELECT uf.*,pb.ProductName,pi.ImageSite,pp.ProductPrice from userFootprint uf LEFT JOIN ProductBasis pb ON uf.productId=pb.ProductId LEFT JOIN ProductImage pi ON uf.productId=pi.ProductId LEFT JOIN ProductPrice pp ON uf.productId=pp.ProductId WHERE uf.userId = #{userId} AND pi.sign=1 order by footprintTime desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM userFootprint WHERE userId=#{userId}
